column4: hmm.. synaptic crashes when i choose a program, that has dependencies, to be installed...
same problem here, it's because of a warty-hoary-package conflict
well.. then i have to run apt-get style... well that just reminds me of my days with debian :D

no, hoary packages f*ck up warty gdm
